title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-3.7 - Unverifiable underground facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-3.7 - Unverifiable underground facilities

State Regulations

If the precise location of an underground facility cannot
be verified by the excavator after diligent search at a reasonable depth within
the tolerance zone as staked, marked or otherwise designated by the operator, the excavator shall so notify such operator as soon as possible. The operator
shall respond in accordance with section
753-4.10
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-3.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
